channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 14:18 Air alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community to Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 14:18 Air alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community to Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
